text: Carrabba's Italian Grill is an American restaurant chain featuring Italian- American cuisine. It is owned and operated by Bloomin' Brands, and headquartered in Tampa, Florida. It was founded on December 26, 1986, by John Charles "Johnny" Carrabba III and his uncle Damian Mandola. Category:American restaurants Category:1986 establishments in the United States
title: Carrabba's Italian Grill
